content:
302 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
    (i)  LAGOS requires any three (3) of Islamic Studies and 
any two (2) of Literature-in-English,  
History/Government, French/Arabic, Geography, 
Mathematics,Yoruba/Igbo, Christian Religious 
Studies, Economics/Commerce.  
  
EDUCATION AND LANGUAGE ARTS:  
CE-AKWANGA  
EDKAN  
EDZAR  
OAU  
  
Two (2) relevant 
NCE/’A’ level passes.  
  
Five (5) SSC credit 
passes including 
English Language 
plus four (4) 
subjects from  
Economics,  
Geography/Physics 
, Government,  
Home Economics,  
History, Arabic,  
Social Studies, Fine  
Arts, Music and 
Literature in 
English.  
  
  
Any three (3) of Yoruba,  
Literature in English, Christian 
Religious studies, History, 
Economics and Islamic  
Studies.  
  
DIRECT ENTRY  
 (i)  OAU requires ‘A’ level passes to include Literature in  
English and Yoruba or French. Accepts Associateship 
Certificate of the University with a merit or its 
equivalent and the UTME requirements.  
  
UTME  
(i) OAU requires ‘O’ level credit passes in Literature in English, 
Yoruba or French.
